## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code

```{r badly-styled-code}
library( dplyr ,warn.conflicts = F)

# This is a comment

starwars |> filter(tolower(substr(name , 1, 1)) %in% letters[1:5]) |> select(1:5) # Another comment
```
